data.title: Techtron Global Services (P) Ltd. on LinkedIn: Zakya Review
data.meta_description:
Exploring Zakya from Zoho
Read the review: https://zurl.co/kT8X
data.text:
Efficient sales order management is a critical aspect of running a successful business. For small businesses and sales teams, the ability to process orders quickly and accurately can significantly impact customer satisfaction and overall business performance. Zoho Inventory has long been a trusted solution for inventory management, providing businesses with powerful tools to streamline their operations. In this blog post, we will explore the features and benefits of the Sales Order Entry App for Zoho Inventory, demonstrating how it can help small businesses and sales teams improve efficiency and boost productivity. Whether you're a small business owner looking to streamline your sales processes or a sales team member aiming to reduce errors and save time, this app has something to offer. https://lnkd.in/g8f9iG8f #Growmax #Zoho #ZohoInventory #ZohoAnalytics #SalesStrategy #DataIntegration #BusinessGrowth #SalesApp #MobileAccess #SmallBusiness #DigitalTransformation #ZohoIntegration #SalesAutomation #B2Bsales #foodandbeverage #FMCG #USA

𝗔𝗿𝗲 𝘆𝗼𝘂 𝗮 𝗳𝗼𝗼𝗱 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗯𝗲𝘃𝗲𝗿𝗮𝗴𝗲 𝗲𝘅𝗽𝗼𝗿𝘁𝗲𝗿 𝘀𝘁𝗿𝘂𝗴𝗴𝗹𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝗶𝗻𝗲𝗳𝗳𝗶𝗰𝗶𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗺𝗮𝗻𝘂𝗳𝗮𝗰𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗼𝗿𝗱𝗲𝗿 𝗳𝘂𝗹𝗳𝗶𝗹𝗹𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁? Managing materials and fulfilling orders can be a real headache, right? 😓 Introducing our 𝗰𝘂𝘀𝘁𝗼𝗺-𝗯𝘂𝗶𝗹𝘁 𝗺𝗮𝗻𝘂𝗳𝗮𝗰𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗼𝗿𝗱𝗲𝗿 𝗳𝘂𝗹𝗳𝗶𝗹𝗹𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗺𝗮𝗻𝗮𝗴𝗲𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗮𝗽𝗽, built using Zoho Creator Developed to empower Food & Beverage exporters like you to streamline your manufacturing and fulfillment process. How? By digitizing and automating various aspects of your process. 🙌 Here's a glimpse of what it can do for you: 𝗣𝗿𝗼𝗱𝘂𝗰𝘁 & 𝗦𝘂𝗽𝗽𝗹𝗶𝗲𝗿 𝗠𝗮𝗻𝗮𝗴𝗲𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁: Manage comprehensive product details, including vendor information and cost prices. This empowers you to make informed decisions and choose the best vendors. 𝗥𝗲𝗮𝗹-𝘁𝗶𝗺𝗲 𝗜𝗻𝘃𝗲𝗻𝘁𝗼𝗿𝘆 𝗩𝗶𝘀𝗶𝗯𝗶𝗹𝗶𝘁𝘆 𝗔𝗰𝗿𝗼𝘀𝘀 𝗪𝗮𝗿𝗲𝗵𝗼𝘂𝘀𝗲𝘀: Gain complete control over your inventory, regardless of location. This facilitates accurate fulfillment planning and avoids stockouts. 𝗦𝗶𝗺𝗽𝗹𝗶𝗳𝗶𝗲𝗱 𝗣𝗿𝗼𝗱𝘂𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗠𝗮𝗻𝗮𝗴𝗲𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁: Empower your team with real-time order visibility, production plans, and raw material management. This translates to a more efficient production process, reduced errors, and happier customers. 𝗦𝘁𝗿𝗲𝗮𝗺𝗹𝗶𝗻𝗲𝗱 𝗢𝗿𝗱𝗲𝗿 𝗙𝘂𝗹𝗳𝗶𝗹𝗹𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁: Effortlessly track materials, fulfill orders efficiently, and ensure on-time deliveries But that's not all! 𝗧𝗼 𝗸𝗻𝗼𝘄 𝗺𝗼𝗿𝗲👉🏼 https://lnkd.in/euZmqsFM Sounds good? It's not just good, it's great👌. So why wait? Take control of your manufacturing and order fulfillment process today with our app! Zoho #zohocreator #zohoapps #manufacturing #orderfulfillment

📥𝗜𝗻𝗻𝗼𝘃𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗔𝗹𝗲𝗿𝘁❗ 𝗘𝘅𝗰𝗶𝘁𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗧𝗶𝗺𝗲𝘀 𝗶𝗻 𝗧𝗲𝗰𝗵 𝗪𝗼𝗿𝗹𝗱📥 In the dynamic landscape of Point of Sale (#POS) software, two remarkable players have stepped into the spotlight: ➡️ Ｚａｋｙａ ＰＯＳ ｂｙ Ｚｏｈｏ: - A versatile POS solution by Zoho, catering to various businesses, except for the laundry and dry cleaning industry. ZakyaHQ derived from Sanskrit, means 𝓟𝓸𝓼𝓼𝓲𝓫𝓵𝓮🌈 ➡️Ｔｕｒｎｓ Ｓｏｆｔｗａｒｅ: - Focused solely on revolutionizing the laundry and dry cleaning business, Turns, with its name derived from 𝓜𝓸𝓿𝓮 🔄 🌐 𝟮𝟭𝘀𝘁 𝗖𝗲𝗻𝘁𝘂𝗿𝘆 𝗖𝗼𝗶𝗻𝗰𝗶𝗱𝗲𝗻𝗰𝗲: - A fascinating twist unfolds as Zoho generates billion-dollar revenue in diverse sectors, while Turns aims to achieve the same feat exclusively in #laundry and #drycleaning. 👔💰 🔄🌈 𝙋𝙤𝙨𝙨𝙞𝙗𝙡𝙚 𝙈𝙤𝙫𝙚: - Merge the two, and the synergy emerges as '#possiblemove'—a perfect blend of versatility and focused innovation. 🙏Welcome ZakyaHQ to the dynamic world of possibilities! 🚀🎉 Cheers to the possibilities! 🌐✨ Kalaiarasan Jayaraman , Jayagopal Theranikal , Vishal Gupta , Sukanth Srivastav #techinnovation #zakyapos #turnsfoftware #zoho #turns #zakya #pos #business

Case study: All-in-one HubSpot CRM for a major e-commerce customer support platform ⤵️ eDesk is a customer support solution provider helping online retailers deliver extraordinary customer service everywhere they sell. The eDesk platform powers 50 million+ conversations every month, resulting in billions of dollars of e-commerce transactions every year. They’d implemented HubSpot 4.5 years previously, but it wasn’t tailored to their business needs. Functions and capabilities were limited, and workflows were getting more and more complicated. It was costing their employees time, not saving it! We turned things around, shaping an intuitive, user-friendly CRM that cut workflows by 75% for less effort and better results. Read the full case study here: https://bit.ly/3FBv96Z

The article "It's Not Business, It's Personal: The Lines Between B2B and B2C Are Blurring" by Future Commerce provides insights into the ever-evolving landscape of #commerce. As professionals in this dynamic field, it's essential to stay ahead of these trends. 🌍 The Blurring Lines: Traditionally, we've separated #B2B (Business-to-Business) and #B2C (Business-to-Consumer) commerce, but this article underscores how these boundaries are rapidly disappearing. The reasons are manifold, from changing consumer behaviors to advancements in #technology. 📈 Consumerization of B2B: We're witnessing a shift where B2B customers are demanding more personalized and convenient experiences, similar to their B2C interactions. Supply chain businesses need to adapt by focusing on user-centric design and customer journeys. 🔗 Omnichannel Integration: A central theme here is the need for seamless #omnichannel #integration. Whether it's #ecommerce, mobile apps, or in-person experiences, businesses must offer a cohesive and unified experience across all touchpoints for end-to-end collaborative visibility. 📱 Digital Transformation: COVID-19 accelerated digital transformation, and this article highlights how it's reshaping both B2B and B2C spaces. Companies investing in technology are poised to lead the way in this new landscape. 💡 Key Takeaway for Professionals: In today's commerce landscape, it's crucial for professionals like us to think beyond traditional categories. We must anticipate and meet the evolving expectations of our customers, whether they're businesses or consumers. #Adaptability and #innovation will be our greatest assets. Let's continue to be agile, learn, and thrive in this exciting era of commerce! 💪 #CommerceEvolution #B2B #B2C #DigitalTransformation #SupplyChainTechnology #SupplyChain

Is Zoho Commerce the game-changer your business needs in 2024? 👀 In our latest blog post, we dive deep into the ins and outs of Zoho Commerce to help you decide if it's the right fit for your business. With an ever-growing list of features and a reputation for innovation, Zoho Commerce promises a lot. But does it deliver? We've explored everything from ease of use to pricing, and customer support to integrations. Our thorough review aims to provide you with all the insights you need to make an informed decision 👇 https://lnkd.in/gxDa_aiE What features do you value most in an ecommerce platform? Share your thoughts in the comments 💡 #ecommerce #zohocommerce #zoho #onlinebusiness #tech
